content: ऋत्विज् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} <ab>Ved.</ab> Sacrificing at the proper season or regularly, {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} A priest who officiates at a sacrifice; यज्ञस्य देवमृत्विजं <ls>Rv. 1. 1. 1</ls>; ऋत्विग्यज्ञकृदुच्यते <ls>Y. 1. 35</ls>; <ab>cf.</ab> <ls>Ms. 2. 143</ls> also; the four chief Ṛtvijas are होतृ, उद्गातृ, अध्वर्यु and ब्रह्मन्; at grand ceremonies 16 are enumerated.
